Comments_List:
Amazing introductory Italian knowledge
Conjugating verbs, forming sentences / stories, understanding films and texts, etc
I received a solid introduction to the Italian language that was well-paced and very productive.

I developed the skills to use correct grammar while writing in Italian and the confidence needed to speak in Italian. I developed some knowledge on everyday vocabulary needed to have a conversation with someone in Italian.
Basic communication in Italian.
You learn enough Italian to be able to have a basic conversation plus quite a lot about Italian culture and history.
I developed an elementary level of Italian.
Basic Italian grammar and vocab
I learned the basic mechanics of the Italian language as well as certain aspects of Italian culture and useful vocabulary tailored to my own experiences and needs.
Strengths: high engagement, AMAZING professor (Miglianti), manageable workload, didn't feel like a burden
The daily rigor was very helpful, but I wish there could've more emphasis on poetry and music as a means to learn the language.

The strengths of this course are the Italian only rule meaning Italian is the only language allowed to be spoken during class and having quizzes before the exams help with doing better on the exams. A weakness of the course could be the small amount of incorporation of the chapter vocabulary into the course.
Very engaging classwork
Great class, the amount of work is just right but it does require a lot of engagement.
The course incorporates a lot of discussion  and practice speaking, which is great. I think the 3 required events can be difficult for students to attend and I personally didn't gain much from them.
Good pace of material and workload
This is a very strong course, I would only suggest more opportunities to exercise what we have learned and make mistakes.
YES. 100% would recommend
